Description: Flint knife blade or pointed tool, worked both sides, with large flakes, fine retouch at pointed tip; butt rounded.
Curator's comments: Found at the feet of a subadult of estimated 14 years. One of the better tools found within the burials considered to be Tasian by Brunton.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 5, 32; pl. 28.36)
